briefTitle: Vitamin K Supplementation in Post-Menopausal Osteopenia

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Lumbar Spine (L1-L4) Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Femoral Neck Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Ultra-distal Radius Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Effect of Vitamin K1 Supplementation on Levels of Bone Formation Marker
outcomeMeasures.description: measured by osteocalcin on elecsys platform

outcomeMeasures.title: Effect of Vitamin K1 Supplementation on Level of Bone Resorption Markers (C-telopeptide: CTX)
outcomeMeasures.description: measured by CTX Elisa assay on elecsys platform

outcomeMeasures.title: Effect of Vitamin K1 Supplementation on Percent of Carboxylation of Osteocalcin
outcomeMeasures.description: measured by osteocalcin hydroxyapatite binding assay

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Total Hip Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Total Hip Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Lumbar Spine (L1-L4) Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Femoral Neck Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at the Ultra-distal Radius Between Treatment Arms.
outcomeMeasures.description: BMD was measured yearly on one scanner at UHN using DEXA Hologic 4500A densitometer

outcomeMeasures.title: Difference in Serious Adverse Events
outcomeMeasures.description: These include hospitalizations for pneumonia, heart failure, gastro-intestinal bleeding, elective and non-elective surgery, cancer and death.

outcomeMeasures.title: Difference in Number of New Cancers by Treatment Arm.
Difference in Number of New Clinical Fractures by Treatment Arm.
